summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new Igate-host admin features: sales reports with date filtering, Kashier payment gateway settings, tax settings, company info settings, and products CRUD. All backend APIs (18/18) and frontend features working perfectly.
passed_tests: Admin dashboard sales report with date filter functionality
Admin settings page loading and navigation
Kashier API settings (Merchant ID, API Key, Mode selection)
Test Kashier connection button (MOCKED - validates credentials exist)
Tax settings toggle and percentage input
Company info settings (name, website, email, phone)
Save settings button with success notification
Admin products page with CRUD operations
Add product button and dialog functionality
Backend API: GET /api/admin/sales-report with date params
Backend API: Products CRUD (POST, PUT, DELETE /api/admin/products)
All existing backend APIs (stats, orders, invoices, contact)
